column2: Comments
The total number of anchor clients for a material sector combination.
The year the market is activated for a particular sector material combination.

The rate of generating leads per quarter for anchor clients for the sector material combination, where each sector material may draw from a common client name. We do not divide between particular clients, but only by client numbers.
A bracket conversion rate to show how many potential clients we believe we can get from a particular set of leads for the sector material combination.
The rate per quarter of generating projects from a potential client.
The number of quarters that the average project lasts once started by a particular anchor client.
The number of projects it takes for a potential client to become a client that will then start placing commercial orders.

The maximum number of projects a potential client generates. This is meant only as a binary on-off switch for a sector material combination, since it is assumed that the project conversion number will be lower than the maximum projects.
The number of quarters before which an active client starts placing a commercial order after it becomes an active client.
The number of quarters of the initial testing phase.
The starting rate of kilograms ordered per quarter per client for each sector material combination.
Percentage growth of orders per quarter in the initial testing phase.
The number of quarters during which requirement may grow at a significant rate.
The starting rate of order of kgs per quarter for each sector material combination during the ramp-up phase.
Percentage growth of rate of order per kg per material during the ramp-up phase.
The starting rate of order of kilograms per material per quarter for each sector-material pair when the client enters a steady order phase that is assumed to grow in perpetuity.
The percentage rate of growth of orders per quarter in the steady state.
The number of quarters between receiving a requirement and fulfilling the delivery for that requirement.
The total number of projects that are already completed for a material sector combination.
The total number of active clients already present in the material sector combination at time T0.
The number of quarters that have elapsed since a client became active for the material sector combination at time T0.
